com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Class SmartCommands.GuardedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.GuardedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    SmartCommands

    public static class SmartCommands.GuardedException
extends java.lang.Exception
    An exception which acts as an Throwable wrapper, and which works in combination with the SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand. It will be triggered during the SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand.onThrowable(Throwable) method.

    The traditional case is to let the exception handler cope in a centralized way with this kind of exception.

    Since:
    2011.11.03
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        throwable - the exception to be wrapped
        displayMessage - the supposedly i18ned message that will be used later on when actually handling that exception
